== header ==
 * 10 bytes
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* || *Description* ||
||0||1|| unknown || unknown ||
||1||1|| NPC/monster count || amount of NPCs and monsters (+spare) ||
||2||1|| map type || 0x01 = 3D map, 0x02 = 2D map ||
||3||1|| unknown || unknown ||
||4||1|| x dim || map x dimension ||
||5||1|| y dim || map y dimension ||
||6||1|| tileset || tileset id ||
||7||1|| music || background music id ||
||8||1|| npc/party palette || npc/party palette ||
||9||1|| unknown || unknown ||

== NPC/monster events ==
 * see [MAPDATA3D#NPC/monster_events]

== map data ==
 * 3 bytes per tile
 * overall: x dim `*` y dim `*` 3 bytes
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* || *Description* ||
||0||12 bit|| overlay || overlay id ||
||12 bit||12 bit|| underlay || underlay id ||

== map events ==
 * see [mapevents mapevents]

== NPC/monster position structure ==
 * see [MAPDATA3D#NPC/monster_position_structure]
